name: simple-logo-gallery
description: Simple Logo Gallery block for WordPress â€” normalized logo strip via react-logo-soup

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss && npm run lint:php
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:scss
scripts.release: npm run build && cd .. && rm -f simple-logo-gallery/simple-logo-gallery.zip && zip -r simple-logo-gallery/simple-logo-gallery.zip simple-logo-gallery -x 'simple-logo-gallery/node_modules/*' 'simple-logo-gallery/.git/*' 'simple-logo-gallery/.gitignore' 'simple-logo-gallery/.DS_Store' 'simple-logo-gallery/src/*' 'simple-logo-gallery/phpcs.xml.dist' 'simple-logo-gallery/package-lock.json' 'simple-logo-gallery/composer.lock' 'simple-logo-gallery/.editorconfig' 'simple-logo-gallery/.eslintrc*' 'simple-logo-gallery/.prettierrc*' 'simple-logo-gallery/package.json' 'simple-logo-gallery/composer.json' 'simple-logo-gallery/webpack.config.js' 'simple-logo-gallery/scripts/*'
